company.name: Tero
company.description:
Your certified Salesforce and Microsoft partner.

We take your business processes from strategy to solutions by implementing, integrating, and optimizing top CRM platforms.

A strategic nearshore partner based in Uruguay, we offer compatible time-zones at cost-effective rates.

With 8+ years of experience, we provide development, support, and consulting services to clients in the US and LATAM.

We have extensive experience in Agile Methodology, valuing transparency and client involvement in every step. Regardless of what stage your project is in, through development, customization, and evolving support, we help you get the most value from your investment in CRM.

We work with:

-        Salesforce
-        Dynamics 365 CE/CRM
-        Power Apps
-        Power BI
-        Power Automate
-        Marketing Automation

Our services offering:

For Clients:

-        Dedicated Teams
-        CRM Support and Evolution
-        Training and Mentoring

For Partners:

-        Staff Augmentation
-        Team Augmentation
